app.title: Excellent JSON
app.subtitle: Convert Excel to JSON with custom structure
app.footer: All processing happens in your browser. Your data never leaves your computer.

upload.title: Start by uploading your file
upload.subtitle: We support Excel files (.xlsx, .xls) and CSV
upload.invalidFile: Please select an Excel file (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV

columnList.title: Available columns
columnList.hint: Drag columns to the area on the right. You can use the same column multiple times.

schema.title: JSON Structure
schema.dropHint: Drag columns here to build your JSON
schema.dropHintAlt: Or use the buttons below to add fields and groups

jsonPreview.title: JSON Preview
jsonPreview.addFieldsHint: Add fields to the schema to see the JSON
